name: Piano
description: The piano is a versatile musical instrument played by means of a keyboard. It is widely used in classical, jazz, and popular music genres.

name: Violin
description: The violin is a string instrument known for its rich and expressive sound. It is an essential instrument in classical music and is also used in various other genres.

name: Guitar
description: The guitar is a popular string instrument with a wide range of musical styles. It is commonly used in rock, pop, folk, and many other genres.

name: Cello
description: The cello is a large bowed string instrument known for its warm and resonant tone. It is a key instrument in orchestras and chamber music ensembles.

name: Flute
description: The flute is a woodwind instrument known for its clear and melodious sound. It is used in various musical genres, including classical and jazz.

name: Trumpet
description: The trumpet is a brass instrument with a bright and powerful sound. It is commonly used in jazz, classical, and marching bands.

name: Drums
description: Drums are percussion instruments played by striking or hitting with drumsticks or hands. They provide rhythm and groove in various music styles.

name: Saxophone
description: The saxophone is a versatile woodwind instrument with a unique and expressive sound. It is commonly used in jazz, blues, and popular music.
